description:
Tommy is muscular and naturally smooth.
“I’m not hairy at all... I never have been. I grow a little bit here and here,” he said, pointing to his crotch and chin. “That’s it.”
Tommy is very laid back and friendly and he smiles a lot.
“I’m just a regular guy,” he said. “I like sports and working out.”
One thing we noticed right away was that he has BIG balls.
“Those are like ostrich eggs!”
He smiled and blushed. “I guess they’re alright!”
title: Tommy
